title: Smart Planner
oneLiner: An AI-powered planning assistant for students.

sections.problem: Students struggle to balance coursework and personal life.
sections.solution: Designed a responsive web app that integrates with calendars to suggest optimal study times.

title: Health Tracker
oneLiner: A mobile concept for monitoring health metrics and habits.

sections.problem: Young adults lack tools to track holistic health.
sections.solution: Created a mobile prototype with personalized dashboards and gamified challenges.
result: High fidelity prototype tested with 10 users.

title: AI Research Tool
oneLiner: A tool to analyze user feedback sentiment.

sections.problem: Hard to categorize qualitative feedback at scale.
insight: Automated sentiment analysis can surface trends.
sections.solution: Built a BERT-based classifier with a user-friendly dashboard.
result: Enabled faster iterations in product development.
